choices.C: Use a basic user as a staging account.
choices.B: Deliver Launcher profile to the end-user.
choices.D: Block open enrollment into Workspace ONE UEM.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
https://www.vmware.com/products/workspace-one/launcher.html

Workspace ONE Launcher enables organizations across all industries—including retail, logistics and healthcare—to easily lock shared or multi-user Android devices in single or multi-app mode, support check-out / check-in, and customize the UI to match your company’s brand, directly from the Workspace ONE console.

comments.content: Correct, the answer is B from personal experience

questions.question_text: Which is required to deliver a Check In, Check Out experience on an Android Device?

comments.content: Correct, answer should be Rest API

questions.question_text: Which underlying technology does Workspace ONE Access use to collect Workspace ONE UEM device information?

discussion.content: A, B, F, WS1 Access makes the Unified Application Catalog possible. Per-App VPN is needed for Mobile SSO for Android, but it's not a WS1 Access feature.
A,B & F as per my knowledge and experience

questions.question_text: Which three options are supported by Workspace ONE Access? (Choose three.)
Which Workspace ONE UEM feature can assist in sending event log information to a Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) tool?

discussion.content:
B. Configure Syslog
During syslog configuration, you can opt to send Console events, Device events, or both. Any events generated by the AirWatch Console are sent to your SIEM tool according to the scheduler settings. Syslog can be configured for both on-premises and SaaS deployments.

questions.question_text: Which two configuration steps must be performed when managing iOS devices? (Choose two.)

discussion.content: Correct CE, simple Apple ID need APNS cert

CE
To generate a new APNs certificate, you need a Apple ID.
https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-Workspace-ONE-UEM/services/UEM_ConsoleBasics/GUID-B408B1B2-CF28-4CDD-A699-C7E8AC0BE140.html

comments.content: No CE is correct. You do not need developer ID to enable APNs, just Apple ID.

discussion.content:
The correct Answers should be B and E. You need Developer ID to obtain APNS certificate. Without enrolling into Apple's Enterprise Developer Program you cannot get APNS or renew it
https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-Workspace-ONE-UEM/1907/WS1_iOS_Platform_Doc.pdf
